title: Best of The Program | Guest: Larry Elder | 7/29/21
description:
Radio host Larry Elder calls in to discuss his gubernatorial run in California and what he would do to fix the state. Glenn digs into the Biden administration’s concerning new definition of “domestic terrorism” and how the Treasury Department, IRS, and private banks could go after your finances.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
